string-array.name: exam_questions
string-array.item: What are keywords?
Differentiate between local and global variable.
Explain difference between variables and constants.
What is the advantage of using a static variable?
What Are The Advantages Of Auto Variables?
What is meant by formatted input and output?
What is the purpose of return statement?
How Do You Print An Address?
What is preincrement and post increment?
What is type casting? Explain it with suitable example.
Explain the difference between ‘=’ and ‘==’ operator explain with example?
Differentiate between relational and logical operators used in C?
What is assembly language?Give examples.
What is an Algorithm?
What are the advantages of high level languages over machine language?
Explain the use of printf and scanf functions.
Give any two differences between compilers & interpreters.
What is an array?
What Is A Function And Built-in Function?
What is an argument ?
Mention The Characteristics Of Arrays In C?
Briefly explain the use of strcmp() function.
Explain in brief a function prototype.
What does a storage class mean? Mention different storage classes available in C.
What is recursion? What are its advantages?
What Is A Null Pointer?
Write a short note on pointer to pointer.
Give differences between call by value and call by reference?
Explain the different kinds of loops available in C with examples.
Explain the use of break and continue statement in loops with example.
What is the difference between while and do while loop?
Write a program to find the sum of numbers from 1 to N.
Write a program to add two matrices.
Demonstrate the usage of a switch statement with an example.
Write a program to add two complex numbers using structures.
Differentiate between Structures and Unions.
Advantages of using Union over Structures.
Explain features of preprocessors.
Which Is Better To Use A Macro Or A Function?Why?
Differentiate between Static Memory Allocation And Dynamic Memory Allocation?
What is the Purpose Of Realloc ( )?
What is EOF and what value does usually have ?
What is a file stream ?
Differentiate Between Text And Binary Modes?
What is the use of gets and puts?
Explain the various modes used in file operation?
Write a C program to read name and marks of n number of students from user and store them in a file.
Is It Better To Use Malloc () Or Calloc ()?Why?
Why can’t we compare structures?
